subject: Re: Are you really using JUnit during your developmen t?
msgSnippet: ... I have grown intolerant of the attitude that testing is optional. ... Robert C. Martin (Uncle Bob)  | email: unclebob@objectmentor.com Object Mentor Inc.
messageBody:
> Hehe... If I'm a heretic because I recommend using your common sense
> instead of one-liners such as "always test first", then yes, guilty as
> charged :-)

I have grown intolerant of the attitude that testing is optional.
